# a2zblocks-packages

Shared build artifacts and development resources used across the A2Z Blocks ecosystem.

## Source of truth

### ABIs

#### dmrkt
Contract code lives in repository `nft-marketplace-engines`. 

## Do not edit

Files in this repository are overwritten by CI pipelines. Changes should be made at the source (contracts repo) and allowed to sync automatically.
